alert.note: Alert for Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pender County through 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rowan, or 15 miles west of Burgaw, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, White Stocking, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Murray Town, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Willard, Currie, Wards Corner, Long Creek, St. Helena, Atkinson, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 408. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
